divs: Sighting DetailsI notes clouds moving on top of our hill,call rocky hill.so i video it.I viewed my recording and ships come from behide it.There are to many to count.I live about 1 mile from Hill.they fly around all over, hover to.at nite thy fallow people.and at day, fallow airplanes. Whats bad about this object,thy are taking our birds.ME AND MY THREE WITNES.Iam consurn about this object.why are thy here,what could happen.I have made contacted with this things.I have poof with pictures of something touching me.I can't sleep very good.I have recording in my home of what ever thy are.not to cute ether.My girlfrend is scared and my two witnes too.I done no if other people no,but I been watching and following this other live forms......Im sorry but I will not upload,someone toke other pictures and vidros.damage my computer.Call me and make arreagments.TI;S NO JOKE,TI:S REALING HAPPENING.PLEASE CALL ME.ALSO THY HOVER OVER HOUSES,IM LOOKING AT THEM RIGHT KNOW IN TOP OF HOUSES.
